bug.author: phemmer
bug.summary: Github issue creation for bugs missing
bug.description:
Note that the option for bug reports is missing. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1826947/74403305-c9ba2500-4df4-11ea-8ec4-bc18da185557.png></denchmark-link>
I suspect this is related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/36636>#36636</denchmark-link> which was recently merged. When I look at the <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/00-bug-issue.md>00-bug-issue.md file</denchmark-link> , there is a space instead of a newline before . Don't know if this would cause it to go missing, but definitely seems not right. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1826947/74403503-6381d200-4df5-11ea-8d05-39f44b5c7ed8.png></denchmark-link>
Others appear missing as well, such as the build/installation issue, & performance issue.
